articles.title: New Instrument To Search For Signs Of Life On Other Planets - Astrobiology News
articles.description: The European Southern Observatory (ESO) has signed an agreement for the design and construction of ANDES, the ArmazoNes high Dispersion Echelle Spectrograph.
